attributes.action: Stop Hector Sants inflicting more damage on the UK economy.
attributes.additional_details:
By his own admission Sants and the FSA have failed in their regulation of the Banks.
As a direct result of his incompetance, the UK economy was brought to its knees and the British tax payer lost billions of pounds.
He is now to be given the post of Deputy Governor of the Bank of England and CEO of the Prudential Regulation Authority.
This man should not be in charge of anything, least of all, the regulation of our economy.
